metadata.dc:author: Alvarez Vicent, J J
metadata.dc:description: A brief summary of the original technique will be made incorporating the following modifications and additions: glottis substituted by neoglottis muscles, sternohyoid or external perichondrium. Supraglottis substituted by remaining tissues of the epiglottis or neoepiglottis. Hypopharynx, section medium line of the pharynx constrictor. Suturing of cartilage with homologous donor cartilage. An evaluation will be made of the functional results.
metadata.dc:title: Modificaciones a la técnica del vaciado endolaríngeo. Técnica personal funcional de laringuectomía.
[Modifications of the technic of endolaryngeal extirpation. The author's own functional technic of laryngectomy].
